text: Erik Takáč (born 26 February 1975) is a Slovak football forward who currently plays for Družstevník Veľký Horeš. ==References== ==External links== * Worldfootball profile * Eurofotbal profile * Futbalnet profile Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FK Slavoj Trebišov players Category:FC Senec players Category:ŠK Slovan Bratislava players Category:1.
